SCoRe has conducted research covering various aspects of wireless sensor networks, embeded systems digital forensic, information security, mobile applications and e-learning.
Mobile bank is a commertial product of University of Colombo School of Computing(UCSC) SCoRe gruop
The goal of our research is to generate computing solutions through identifying low cost methodologies and strategies that lead to sustainability.
